title: Maharani Diamond and Emerald Haaram with Matching Jhumka Set - A Regal Heirloom
materials: South Sea Pearls. Exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This majestic Haaram features a graduating design with intricate Polki diamond settings interspersed with vibrant green emeralds. Delicate South Sea pearl drops add a touch of classic elegance. The central pendant boasts a larger emerald centerpiece surrounded by a floral motif of diamonds. The matching Jhumkas echo the necklace design with a similar floral crown and pearl drop. The setting uses traditional nakshi work to create texture and depth.
colors: Predominantly gold with shimmering white diamonds
complemented by the rich green of the emeralds and the creamy white of the pearls. The ruby red center provides a striking contrast.
occasions: and grand festive occasions like Diwali. Traditionally worn at Muhurtham
and other important Telugu and South Indian ceremonies. Makes a statement at high-end social events.
description: A truly magnificent Haaram set representing South Indian heritage and craftsmanship. The use of uncut diamonds and natural emeralds signifies opulence and prosperity. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine. A timeless piece that can be passed down as a family heirloom, carrying cultural significance and sentimental value.
